website_summaries.verdict: This model is not as robust as other options, but it comes with some nice bonus items.
pros: Features 16 foot nylon ribbon with reinforced snap hook joint for security
Designed for dogs up to 110 pounds
Push button lock and anti-slip handle
Comes with waste bag dispenser and collapsible travel bowl
cons: Retraction mechanism may fail over time

customer_reviews.title: Ripped in 3 weeks, awful product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is downright bad. I had this leash for 3 weeks before it ripped. (See photos) The leash is supposedly rated for 110lb dogs but mine is 16lbs! I’m only glad I noticed the tear when I did so that it didn’t break in a dangerous area. This pathetic product couldn’t last 1 month. My other retractable leash made it a whole year before tearing. Besides the tearing the locking mechanism isn’t as smooth or easy to use as other leashes I’ve tried. I’m shocked this product has so many positive reviews. A leash being this fragile is dangerous for your pet! Be warned!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my medium/large dog. She has a tendency to go a little nuts on walks when she sees something worth loosing her mind over (every 10 seconds), and puts a lot of wear on her leashes. We got this one as a replacement for the last one she broke and so far it has been nice and sturdy and comfortable to use. The travel bowl is a nice bonus for longer hikes.
customer_reviews.author: G.G.

customer_reviews.title: I love this package!
customer_reviews.text: The handle is sturdy yet not heavy, with an easy grip. The clip is nice as well. My dog chewed through his old leash and he hasn't attempted this one yet. Its nice and long and retracts easily. The dish that came with it is perfect. Its collapsable and lay flat and nice and big when opened. I haven't used the bag dispenser, I didn't even realize it was apart of the package! This is a great leash, especially for the cost. The leash my dog chewed through in 3 weeks was 25.00 bucks and that was on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Dida134

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and can handle large dogs for sure
customer_reviews.text: Definitely skeptical when it arrived - but quickly realized it was definitely worth the money. Only thing I don’t like is how everything clips to the handle instead of a built in eyelet or something, but would not prevent me from buying again! The leash doesn’t seem like it would hold a 100lb dog but our large German Shepherd feels safe on it at >75lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Gizmo9965

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: It was sturdier than I had anticipated, but that is a good thing. My previous leash was a cheapy from Walmart, and this leash is so much better. It's really easy to hook up and unhook. It has the non-slip grip all the way around the handle. High quality and it exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: walt bewley

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice retractable leash. No problems stopping our 30lbs puppy running full tilt in the opposite direction and the ribbon has held up to some chewing and tugging. The included bowl is on the small side but perfectly functional and great to take on a walk or to the dog park. The bag dispenser is also great as having one on all the leashes is super handy. For the price I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 month of use
customer_reviews.text: We have a 40 pound german shepard who used this leash a few times a day. The leash tore after one month, right after it was not eligible for return! The claim was that it was suitable for 110 pound dog, my 40 pound puppy ripped it just running. Save your money and buy a different leash!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hiva

customer_reviews.title: No good if your dog has sharp teeth -20 seconds it was done(updates)
customer_reviews.text: If there is any chance that your dog may put the tape in his mouth forget it. It only took 20 seconds for my dog to bite right through the tape Update: the seller (USA Warehouses) reached out to me and asked me if I was satisfied. When I explained the issue to them I never heard back. UPDATE 4/21/2019: I upgraded my rating because I received an unexpected replacement in the mail today, nice touch, fantastic customer service. I will give it another try.
customer_reviews.author: Code Monkey

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS LEASH!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS LEASH! The leash broke while I was walking my dog. He is 60 lbs and wasn’t pulling away from me at all. I’m so confused as to why this leash broke, my only thought is that it’s cheaply made probably! I knew I should have just went to the pet store and bought one! Ugh!!
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Great leash for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product if you have a med to large dog. But not for a small dog, like was advertised. The heading stated good for small and large dogs. However I have 2 small dogs and the tension on the leash and the size of the clasp is just to much for a small dog. Great product for the right sized dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: clip came off within a week
customer_reviews.text: I was super disappointed with this product. We've only had the leash about week and the clip came off this morning. In full disclosure, the dog had turned around and put her moth on the leash, but only for a second. She'll mouth the leash on the way back into the house. The fabric of the leash immediately cut clean. Our dog isn't left unattended and this leash is only used to take her out the bathroom in our backyard. She also isn't a toy destroyer (as evidenced by the bajillion stuffed toys floating around our house.) I certainly wouldn't call this "heavy duty"!! So glad this happened in our backyard and not out in public.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E.

customer_reviews.title: Not what expected
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed with this product. I have a Timberwolf mix, and he doesn’t pull at the leash at all. However, this leash wouldn’t stay clipped around his collar. It also twisted when retracting back into the plastic part. I am going to try to continue use with this, as we bought it for an upcoming trip and I don’t have time to return and rebuy. The handle is a nice size for my husband to use, but a little bulky for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jack L

customer_reviews.title: Very unsatisfied with customer service
customer_reviews.text: This product lasted one month of daily walks before snapping in half. We have a small 6 month old puppy, only 45 pounds that broke it one day when pulling a little harder than normal. Because it had passed the return period, I was unable to return it. I tried contacting the company to give feedback and see if they would replace the item, but I never heard back from them. I would not buy based on the lack of customer service. We did like the leash itself but it did not last nearly long enough and did not live up to the strength promised.
customer_reviews.author: Signe Joann

customer_reviews.title: Very large, but has held up well for now
customer_reviews.text: Although our puppy is only small to medium in size right now, she wore out and broke her first retractable leash after about a month. We've only had this one for a short time, but so far it is seeming to hold up fairly well. I like the coordinating accessories it came with, and the bright color helps us to spot it easier if it doesn't get put back where it belongs immediately. My only real complaint is that it is very bulky and heavy for what it is. It is a little difficult to hold if trying to juggle other things in your hands. However, I am hoping that the size and bulkiness will equal sturdiness and longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Liz G.

customer_reviews.title: Love this leash!
customer_reviews.text: This leash packs all of the punch of our last leash - but it's definitely much lighter weight while maintaining the sturdiness of our former retractable leash. The mechanics of the leash are smooth and the hardware attached is very good quality. We both give it thumbs up - and Daisy would, too, if she had thumbs! Love the little bonus add-ons, too...especially the collapsible water bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Texan

customer_reviews.title: Skip these ones.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these leashes on the 1st of 2019 to take two dogs outside apps 3-4 times a day. If you try to lock them while your dog is running, it skips gears in an extremely loud fashion. If this happens enough times, it will no longer lock and consequently, will no longer retract. March 19th, 2019 they are both in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: michael Haefner

customer_reviews.title: I have more control over my beagle
customer_reviews.text: So far, I like everything about this leash. I have a 3 year old Beagle with a mind of his own when I take him for his walk. We live in a very wooded area and when we go for walks his nose is always to the ground. With the long rope I was using it was easy for him to get wrapped up around trees. Your leash gives me so much more control and can be easily shortened when needed. He weighs 30 pounds, I don't worry about all the tugging he does. The leash seems pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: Laura B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The retractable leash is a great product for the price, and comes with a nifty little collapsible dish and poop bag holder. Can't beat $20 bucks for all that. The leash itself is thick and durable, but I've run into a few issues with it sticking and not always retracting when it should, and I've had it less than a week. Also, the handle is too big to actually clip the poop bag and dish to, so unless you are wearing a purse or jeans that have something to clip it to, you're going to be carrying it anyway. All-in-all, I'm satisfied for what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This leash is so much better than I thought it would be. I really didn’t wanna get one with a tape style leash instead of the cord but this thing Doesn’t tangle. I love the reflective thing sewn into it all the way through and on all sides. I had just returned a leash with a cord bc the handle felt awkward to hold. This one is more natural shaped I guess and I like that it has rubber on the handle so it doesn’t slip. Update: I’ve had this leash for just over a year and the tape has still never tangled.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Holds up w/70 lb Pit
customer_reviews.text: We have a 70 lb american pitbull terrier who is very hyper and loves to pull. I was very skeptical about buying this leash b/c of some of the reviews saying it jammed, the leash broke or it fell apart. We have been using this leash 4+ times per day to walk him and it is very sturdy. He does pull sometimes, but is much better than he was using a regular 6 ft leash. We also purchased a martingale collar which helped with him pulling so much. But needless to say, this leash has held up to a lot with him and we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Appearances can be deceiving...
customer_reviews.text: The leash worked great initially - nice look, easy to operate, use and hold. Then on the 2nd use, our 8 week old puppy was able to chew through the cord in a matter of a couple minutes rendering the leach completely useless. We're very disappointed that a puppy could destroy this leash so easily and in such a short amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: rush2112

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, locking mechanism a weakness.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. I purchased two of these four months ago. The locking mechanism is broken on one of them- the one that I use for our 60 pound puppy. The problem seems to be that when you use the slide to hold the button in the lock position, it doesn't hold the button in far enough so the lock isn't fully engaged into the locking slots. If the do pulls hard enough it can skip and the leash can ull out. After a while, it takes less and less pull for the lock to slip. The sliding lock that holds the button in is too easy to engage accidentally. So unfortunately, I can't recommend this retractable leash.
customer_reviews.author: S. H.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Broken after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: The water bowl snapped after a dozen uses, the plastic was cheap. Same with the poop bag dispenser. This is excusable since I really wanted the leash; however, the leash is broken now too. The internal mechanism slips and my dog can run to the full length, something that's dangerous around cars, cats, and why i want a locking leash.
customer_reviews.author: KTS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had quite a few retractable leashes of varying quality. I’m so impressed with how durable and comfortable the leash is and the accessories are just icing on the cake. It’s so convenient to have a collapsible bowl for my pug when we are out for a walk and he needs a drink to cool off. The flashing light is perfect at night when we are out for a short walk. And the matching doggie bag holder is adorable. I’d recommend this product to anyone wanting good quality equipment for their pets.
customer_reviews.author: MsHI2u

customer_reviews.title: Very strong, maybe too much for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: This leash is very, very strong, actually too strong for my little chihuahua. It would probably be great for a bigger dog but I feel bad for my little guy because this thing is constantly pulling on him, even when I'm trying to let him just roam around, because the tension is so strong. I believe this would be better for a German Shepherd or something. I have since found my old retractable leash and gone back to that one because it lets my dog relax more while he wanders around near me.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great for larger dogs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for two dogs, a 50 lb and a 75 lb. Both have given the ultimate test of running after something at full speed and getting jerked backward when the leash held. I love the color. The push-button is perfect for when I need to stop them quickly or latch it when they've gone far enough. I have used them on walks and while camping. The dog bowl is a little small for my beasts but the doggie bag holder is cute. I put one in my car and the other in my husband's. Perfect for bigger dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Wannabewriter

customer_reviews.title: Very nice leash!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice leash. I find it hard to find large dog leashes locally. Looking on line gives too many choices and makes it difficult to tell a good product from a bad one. After studying feedback I came to this one. I am glad I did. I seems ery nice and well made. Smooth and a good medium strong spring to keep the leash taunt.
customer_reviews.author: Wulfbait

customer_reviews.title: Great leash!
customer_reviews.text: We have an 80 lb Pitt bull who does not walk well on the leash, he pulls a lot. I was worried that his pulling would break it. We walked about 6 miles with him and it worked great! I loved that it also came with the holder for the bags and the water bowl. We used all of the pieces and they were all excellent. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with the quality of this product
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the quality of this product. The retracting leash is smooth. I like how the locking mechanism works. Also impressed with all the matching items that came with the product. These items all have a purpose and work together. I am a hiker as well as walk the beach with my dog every morning. I love that I have dog bowl, poo bags and light to use on our walks. And of course who doesn't love all the color choices and that everything matches. :)
customer_reviews.author: Linda G.

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN ALREADY
customer_reviews.text: Had it for exactly 2 weeks and it broke!!! The part that attaches to the harness just snapped off. And I have a small Corgi puppy. So disappointed, I really liked that it came with the clip on bags and bowl but only 2 weeks of use for the price I paid.... Not cool!!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Bivin

customer_reviews.title: Leash line is too thin and in my estimation is a safety concern for both the owner and the dog.
customer_reviews.text: I used this retractable leash on my Husky. CONS 1) The very thinness of the leash caused nasty burns on my free hand when I needed to catch him up very quickly. 2) While sitting beside me as I spoke with someone he was able to very quickly chew the leash through, once again due to the thinness of the leash. 3) The design of the locking mechanism makes it very easy to lock up unintentionally. PROS Comfortable to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 1 day
customer_reviews.text: This broke the first time I used it. The leash snapped off when my dog pulled as soon as we started on the hiking trail. Luckily no one was hurt. No way to fix. Threw it away. Color is as expected and the collapsible bowl works well. Didn't get a chance to use the doggie bag holder yet.
customer_reviews.author: ErikaJae17

customer_reviews.title: Leash snapped after two weeks of use with 9lb dog
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product when I first got it. The reflective quality, the smooth retractable operation and the handy accessories. I used it 3 or 4 times to offleash train my dog. I started using it regularly the past two weeks to let my pup roam the grass patches around my parents house. Last night my dad took her for a walk and the leash snapped on a busy street. If it only withstands my little dog for a few weeks, then larger dog owners should be careful when purchasing this!
customer_reviews.author: Pri

customer_reviews.title: There's a Learning Curve, but it's Well-Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this leash because I was tired of squeezing my big hands into the handle of the current one I have. This one has a spacious, easy-to grip handle that is *very* comfortable. The only qualm I had was the lock slider is easy to accidentally engage if you're trying to press the lock button, but I got used to it with practice. The leash is the perfect length and strength for my 28lb Cavalier mix.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and good looking product. The doggy doo canister and the collapsable dog dish are a nice feature. I have only been using it for a week. Quality seems very good. The thumb stop and lock work great. My only concern will be the rewind spring. I seems a little weak but only time will tell. My last one lasted just over 2 years so we will see how this one does. That is the only reason I gave it 4 stars on durability. If the spring had been stronger it would have had 5 stars across the board.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Whelan

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on a quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great leash set. Very sturdy and retracts smoothly. I love that it came as a set with the matching clip on bone for poopy bags and the collapsible water dish to leave in the car or day hike bag (one can never have to many of those) it also came beautifully packaged that was recyclable which I also appreciate.. where most packaging just makes the product look cheap. I highly recommend you get this set, great deal that stretches the buck but doesn't skimp on the quality of the product!!
customer_reviews.author: Mamabird4

customer_reviews.title: Broke?
customer_reviews.text: The button on top snapped off during the third use. I'm not sure if it was just a defect in the one I bought or what.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: I love it but...
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I adore this product. I love the packaging, the color and the leash and the extra freebies. I think this makes a great gift for a new puppy/dog parent. Unfortunately, my 11 week old puppy is a chewer and the part of the leash she can reach is already fraying. It is what it is because I'm still training her to "respect the leash" but I'm kinda sad because I may have to eventually toss this out. I wish there's a way to replace fraying part of the leash. But overall, I love this company. I even bought the matching brush and nail clipper set. :)
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, strong and adorable 😃
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 60lbs and loves to walk and sniff! This leash is smooth functioning with a sturdy feel in the leash and control mechanism!! Haves used the ‘poop pickup’ bags which are generous and strong. Haven’t used the bowl yet and while it appears small, I think it is perfect to control possible slurping messes. I’m very pleased and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: sunni

customer_reviews.title: Best leash so far...
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid well-constructed leash, the best I've tried so far. We have a small 13lb dog, who constantly runs ahead, then I catch up and pass and he runs ahead again. So, the leash is constantly retracting and expanding, and the spring is still going strong... I think it would work for much larger dogs as well. I've had it for 5 months so far, and no signs of weakness. Whereas several others I've had would have broken by now.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Gerrits

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY! DURABLE & STRONG
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy and excellent dog leash. I use this for my 76 pound lab when I go hiking and it’s so easy to use. My dog also pulls and lunges at other dogs and people and this retractable leash doesn’t even budge! Love it! The doggy bags & dog bowl are a nice bonus for the price!
customer_reviews.author: ronnell fleming

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised with the quality and presentation of this product. It is very sturdy and the additional items in the set were all very well made also. I would definitely order again. If I had a complaint, it would be that the sturdy construction makes this leash a bit heavy for our long walks. However, I would much prefer the weight over an inferior product.
customer_reviews.author: Emily W

customer_reviews.title: Favorite leash by far
customer_reviews.text: The lock requires some getting used to, but it is clearly a very sturdy leash and very reflective and helps with visibility. The last leashes we bought, a bigger dog hanging out with our dogs managed to chew through. We have 8-10lb yorkies and we use this with them to be safe. No fear about this leash snapping. Doesn't get jammed either. The grip is non-slip so that also adds some security - haven't dropped this one once since buying it maybe two months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for my 100 pound Pit Bulls.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these. Honestly, I expected these to break as soon as my boys pulled on them a little. I was wrong. The other night on a walk there was a rabbit in our path, I didn’t see it and the boys took off full sprint after it. They hit the end of the line and were stopped dead in their tracks. Great product. Well made. The little bowl and poop bag holder is just icing on the cake. Would recommend highly and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CSHudson

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 2nd use😔 what a waste of $20! The leash doesn't tangle but the nylon is super thin and rips easy. Used a total of 10 minutes and my dog is only 40lbs
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Very durable leash!
customer_reviews.text: This 3-in-1 combo, the leash, disposable bags, and bag holder are all great! The leash is very durable and the nylon ribbon is about a half inch and very sturdy, too! It's very easy to use. It's a bit larger and heavier than I thought it would be for my 13 pound terrier, but it has a great handle, and won't slip out of your hand, so I actually like it. It's better than any leash I've ever had, which means it will hopefully last a long time!! Joy, Kim
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: The Water Bowl...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 100+lb lab, he gives it a good pull every now and again id say the lock holds him 4 out five times (hence the 4 out 5 stars). The most impressive part about this little setup is the collapsible water dish. A lot more useful then I ever would have imagined. WE we get back for the walk / run the dog is looking for the bowl. If its a long walk or hot out or just a road trip. a portable water/ feed dish, poop bags, and a long leash is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bsavy

customer_reviews.title: Strong Leash
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this leash on a 90 lb. dog who will on occasion break into a high speed run to chase a deer. The leash has withstood his lunges and allowed me to maintain control. I have had no difficulties with it and find it to be very comfortable. The only quirk is that the locking mechanism works opposite any other retractable leash I have used so that requires a little adjustment but I do not hesitate to recommend this leash. The bonus folding dish and poop bag dispenser are also appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: R. Curtiss

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Steady Leash
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this product for a few weeks now and can decidedly say we like this leash vs the other ones we've used. The leash is a bit heavy (which I like personally - gives it good weight to hold the dog steady) and has a strong retractable lead which is good for keeping sufficient pressure on your dog (so they know where you are). Also no problems with the stopping/locking mechanism with quite a bit of use over the last few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Slavikavik

customer_reviews.title: I can never find a really good one.
customer_reviews.text: Like all of the retractables I have had in the past, the locking mechanism is unreliable. Sure, it locks okay, but the lock always gets jammed making it useless as a retractable. I had to work on it for 15 minutes last night to get it unlocked. This guy is only a puppy - maybe 20 pounds soaking wet. Maybe someday someone will invent one that works.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Tarwacki

customer_reviews.title: The best leash I ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: What a difference a great leash can make when walking a dog. I have owned several leashes in the past, from a traditional style to retractable. This is by far the best one I ever owned. It's nice being able to give my dog more freedom during our walks thanks to the leash being able to extend to 16' in length. I also really like the collapsible water dish included with the leash. This will definitely come in handy next summer when I take my dog to a park or on road trips.
customer_reviews.author: William Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: The leash is a lot bigger than I anticipated, but it seems very sturdy. The clip is quite large, but it fits on my 4lb Yorkie's harness without any problems. The added accessories are perfect and make it a great value. Everything clips onto the leash, so it is very handy. I've had a little trouble with the locking button. I have to press it fairly hard to get it to stay. Overall, great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana carrion

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product exceeded my expectations. It is solid, well assembled, quality materials, and most importantly comfortable for both me and my pup. The BONUS bag holder and collapsible bowl was the reason I bought this particular item. For all 3 items that I was needing would have been much more separately. It is just what I needed for my new pup, and the fact that this leash came with them was perfect. Well played sir. Well played. Color is perfect (green) as my pup's favorite thing is a tennis ball right now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: The leash broke the 3rd time we used it with our puppy. We ordered it before we had our new puppy, not knowing how long it would take for the leash to arrive. It arrived before the puppy. We didn't use the leash right away because our puppy was too little to walk on a leash. The 3rd time we used the leash, the leash clip attached to the dog collar broke off from the rest of the leash. The return window was closed by the time we really got around to using it. :( It would have been a nice leash had it not broke.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Large leash
customer_reviews.text: I got this thinking it would be smaller. Large and fairly heavy leash. The metal clip that hooks to the dog is pretty heavy so I wouldn't recommend getting this for a 5 lb. Puppy. I bought a separate leash to use until she is bigger. I like the color and that free items that come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany M.

customer_reviews.title: Best Leash Yet
customer_reviews.text: In the past 9 months, I've gone through 4 leashes. This one, after 1.5 months, seems to be the best. It is large, but I find that to be a plus, since I have large hands. The coil retracts very well, and it is far more durable than all of the others that I have used. My dog likes to chew through the leash, and though this may not hold up to that, I now put duct tape on the first foot of leash so if he turns around and tries to chew, it does not go through. Overall, a great leash after a month and a half of hard use.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent S.

customer_reviews.title: I would return this if I could.
customer_reviews.text: I walk dogs and bought this to replace my 15 year old leash. I don’t like the line, it catches wind and doesn’t hold the dog tight. It’s also hard to unlock the leash while using so the line constantly gets caught under the dogs when you lock it while the dog is ahead and you finally catch up to the dog. You should be able to retract it easy to keep the dog from getting tangled. I would return this if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and great quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved this leash and all the extras that come with it! The handle is easy to hold and exactly as pictured, the material of the cord doesn’t cause a brush burn affect which is great because my dog has wrapped my ankle before and with this I don’t have to worry. It came with the collapsible dish, light, and bags which are all great quality. Packaging was very nice and I loved this kit for my golden to have on the go.
customer_reviews.author: H. Drake

customer_reviews.title: Nice combination package!
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nicely packaged set. It would make a great gift for a dog lover. The retractable leash appears sturdy, however I'm using it on an older calm dog. The locking mechanism was different from other retractables and took a little getting used to but easy to operate after getting the hang of it. Matching poopie bag holder and water dish are nice extras. Collapsible dish is handy and easy to carry and store. Overall a good set.
customer_reviews.author: K-Angel.

customer_reviews.title: Ita a bit big in the handle.
customer_reviews.text: Ok this is heavy duty, it is durable. But it is made for people with big hands. The shape of the handle makes it hard to reach the break. I used it the first time today and my dog reacted to.another dog and I ended up just grabbing the leash because I couldn't easily lock the leash. So it is nice to have the poopy bags and the water bowl, but the handle is a bit big for normal hand size people.
customer_reviews.author: mckenzie wilson

customer_reviews.title: No instructions!
customer_reviews.text: It did not come with any instructions whatso ever. It said, "Push button to lock," which is not correct. When I let go of the button, leash kept retracting. Finally, I figured out if you slide the black base around the button, you can lock and unlock the leash. The black base around the button seems kind of flimsy. Not sure how it would hold up if dog is constantly tugging. Stars subtracted for no instructions. Bad if you need to use it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: S P

customer_reviews.title: Snapped in a week
customer_reviews.text: This leash was good at first until it snapped. We had it for only about a week. We have an 80 pound St. Berdoodle (1/2 St. Bernard, 1/2 Standard Poodle). He is still a puppy, 8 months old, but strong. He does chew on leashes, but didn’t have a chance with this one and it still snapped. We purchased another one before this and it lasted longer, but this one is awkward to lock while in your grip. It doesn’t flow with your natural tendency to lock in a forward motion with your thumb.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to lock!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this leash other than the locking mechanism. It is cumbersome and not intuitive. When you have a 115 lb dog excited to see the neighbor hood squirrel dashing off at full speed, you want an easy quick lock. Instead its easy to fumble and not lock. Perhaps with practice it will get easier, but I don't feel like I should have to practice quickly locking a leash.
customer_reviews.author: LJMT

customer_reviews.title: Good value Leash Kit
customer_reviews.text: Product is good value. Feels durable, locking mechanism is easy to use once you get used to it. The bonus travel bowl and LED light are mediocre quality, but if you consider them free bonus's they are not bad. The box that the leash arrives in does not indicate the bonus materials are inside but they were packed in. The plastic connector that attaches the waste bag dispenser to the handle does not fit as shown in the product images but still functions without being disruptive. Seller was very quick responding to questions.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Broke within the first week.
customer_reviews.text: It broke within the first week. 😑 The leash got jammed/stuck and would no longer extend or retract. I have a small dog (not a toy) and thought this kind leash might be nice for him at the beach. Nope. We will stick to our rope leash.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: It takes some getting use to!
customer_reviews.text: I really like what I received for my new puppy. It was a really good deal. It does take some getting use to with using the retractable leash and figuring out the button for someone whose use to a regular type leash. Figuring it out and really like the concept. Lots of extras with the leash which I thought was pretty cool. Retractable leash is sturdy and is comfortable in your hand. Well worth the money. Glad I bought this item!
customer_reviews.author: BlackRock

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a retractable leash for my dog. Saw this and liked the fact that it came as a set with waste bag dispenser and a collapsible water bowl. The bowl makes it easy to take water with you in your car or your gulf cart. It would even fit in a medium size purse. They offer great customer service. I had my set for about three months when the brake lock system stopped working. I called customer service and they sent me a new leash right away, no questions asked, said they were very sorry I didn't even charge me for shipping. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: N L C

customer_reviews.title: The holding power and grip
customer_reviews.text: Great product for large dogs. 50lb. Colors great, easy to find if misplaced. Clip and cloth leash line thick. This is my third purchase. The Grip handle is comfortable and large grip. Has a 16ft leash lead. Price is comp to most brands but shipping is fast. I have had the green and the purple leases . The added accessories of the dog water bowl, doggy bag dispenser and led a plus. Its a product all in one.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard E Renquin

customer_reviews.title: Great for doggos
customer_reviews.text: This is such an awesome leash. Easy to use and my doggo loves to be able to run around without having to be tugged so close. It locks at a flick of a finger and auto winds in as the dog approaches . It has a good handle for gripping. The bag waste holder is so cute and is easy to pull and tear as needed. The water bowl is collapsible for easy carrying .
customer_reviews.author: Anita grimes

customer_reviews.title: It's fine
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice leash. The first one I received broke in 2 weeks. But it seems like I got a defective one. The replacement so far has held up well. No complains on this one. But they need to work on honoring their replacement policy since amazon still is charging me for the new replacement. I contacted them and nothing
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.CalvTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Leash works well but is a little bulky, I have small hands and it took a little getting used to. The collapsible water dish was mistaken for a frisbee and destroyed within seconds, no joke! Might be ok for small or old dog, but not for dogo. Bag holder is nice but was difficult to attach to the leash for me. Overall bought this for the leash and think it works well and is worth the $15, the extra stuff with it is meh.
customer_reviews.author: Joell

customer_reviews.title: Best Leash on the Market!!!!! Would recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Came with everything it said it would. Easy to use and seems very durable. Much better quality than the one I bought from Petco which was more expensive. Absolutely love the bone shaped poop bag dispenser that attaches. We then attached the bowl on to that so my pup has poop bags and water with every walk. UPDATE: Bought this for second time because I misplaced the leash and still love it! I wouldn’t even think about buying a different leash. And now it comes with a little light to put on my dogs collar!! So nice for when I let her outside at night time!! Thank for the awesome product!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kiera

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product doesn’t function well
customer_reviews.text: I liked all the gadgets this leash came with, but the actual quality of the leash is pretty bad. The retraction is very strong, so if your dog is small he has to actively be pulling on the leash even if he’s just standing there. Retraction is too strong. Also the button releasing the leash or stopping the leash is terribly cheap and gets stuck almost every time you push it. Really stuck to the point that you have to put everything down, make your dog stop moving and work on it for a while to get it working again. High price for such a cheap product. Very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Retractable beast
customer_reviews.text: This is a monster compared to other retractables I've owned. My only gripe is that the lock-out slider is very sensitive and needs to be unslid most of the time after hitting the stop button. But the strength of the spring is second to none.
customer_reviews.author: Scoob Edoo

customer_reviews.title: Feels sturdy not cheap like most I have went through
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bundle for a prepared walk with pup! I don’t know how many times we just left for a walk or to hang out in the park for awhile and always forgot either the poop bags or her collapsing bowl, with this bundle they all connect and are in one area. The handle is a bit on the heavy side but it’s because it’s not a cheap feeling one it feels sturdy and durable with a great grip material. It sucks the leash in nice and smooth so it prevents tripping or tangling! Thanks so much for the extended leash and bundle, recommended and well made!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie A Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great retractable leash!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike about this leash. It works perfectly, has reflective threading on it for night time visibility as well as the bright case, plus comes with some nice extras. We use the travel bowl a lot in the Summer especially and the bag dispenser on every outing. This is out second one of these. We loved the first one so much we wanted a second one to keep downstairs for when we walk our dog out back.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Company!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best retractable leash I have found; added bonus is the attached bag dispenser. There was also a collapsible outdoor dog bowl and informative enclosures in the well-designed box. The lease allows me to easily lock or retract the leash with one hand and which allows control my excitable dog very well.
customer_reviews.author: Twin2th

customer_reviews.title: Awesome leash, fantastic customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 93lb great Dane mix that I use this leash for. It works well, however the first one I got had the locking mechanism break on me because he'd go after squirrels. (Typical of a dog 😂) I got ahold of the seller and the leash was on it's 60 day warranty period. They sent me a brand new one, free of charge, very quickly and the customer service was fantastic!! All in all, Yes I would suggest this leash. Just don't try to lock it while it's moving unless you want a broken locking mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: Keigan

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth it! PLEASE PLEASE consider this. The quality is surprisingly amazing! My dog is in the 25-30lbs range and I enjoy that the leash has reflecting threading. Sadly I fell down first day and scratched the handle but it was a pretty hard fall. With that being said, it’s durability is incredible. I’m happy with the price point because I saved over $50!!
customer_reviews.author: Freddie Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good retractable leash while it lasted. It lasted 6 months before snapping when my dog bolted when a cat hissed at her. The leash says it can hold a 110-lb dog. My dog is 65 pounds. Product support only lasted 3 months, which i don't think is that great to be honest. In terms of the locking mechanism, it's pretty good, not perfect. Feels like it can 'slip' sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: #ATLUTD

customer_reviews.title: Water bowl is smaller than shown.  Puppy size
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this leash so far so I didn't hesitate to order another when my other dog's leash broke the other day. I know the bowl is only a bonus but this one is much smaller than the first one I got. That bowl I use all the time and was happy to be getting a spare but it is puppy size and of no use to me. Otherwise I am satisfied. The leash is for up to 100 lb dog but the bonus bowl does not match.
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great value
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived in 2 days. I received the leash, the pop up dish and the poo bag dispenser with a roll of bags. I love the silicone coated handle on the leash, it makes it very easy to grip and hold on to. The box that everything was packaged in was very nice and kept it from moving around during shipping. I will be ordering another one of these to replace the second retractable leash that I have once it breaks or I loose it.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: The added accessories, the comparable bowl and doggie bag holders are a great touch for walks.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this bundle. Just adopted our new little Fur Buddy, and he is a small breed but has a ton of energy. He is a Jack Russell mix, our first leash just did not make the grade. The 16 foot lead really allows our boy to explore but remain secure until we have a stronger trust in his decisions. The only improvement I would like to see is a wrist strap. The handle is great and easy to hold but a secondary restraint would be an added benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Tronsberg

customer_reviews.title: Great leash!
customer_reviews.text: This leash has a good range, and a thick mesh that doesn’t give when our 1 year old poodle gets excited. He’s a bigger dog with muscle, and has blown out many similar leash styles. This one is holding up great! The green is a good color too, and the accessories actually match well. The lock isn’t my favorite, but it hasn’t died yet so maybe it’s a good thing. All in all I’d recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hartnett

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't really tested the leash out yet, but it appears to be a well made, durable retractable leash. The Ruff and Ruffus card included in the package was adorable and a bit of smart marketing. The collapsible silicone bowl was a nice bonus, but the waste bags dispenser was too chinsy to be of any real value. Overall it appears to be a great value! I'll update this review if it falls short of 5 stars when in full use with my 55lb. fur buddy. He pulls like a 80lb. sled dog!!
customer_reviews.author: michael indre

customer_reviews.title: Great minus the water bowl
customer_reviews.text: I think the leash is great. the other items (bowl & poop bag holder) are sub-par. Our bowl completely broke off the top part where you can click it within 2 weeks of using. Recommend just getting a dog water bottle. The poop bag holder comes off at times. No complaint for the main item (the leash) though. I bought this item before it included the mini led light and it was like 6 bucks cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Works very well and its convienent to have the Waste Bag Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I love how this gives my pup some freedom but I have the ultimate control of her distance from me. It's so nice that this came with the Waste Bag Dispenser for on walks. I wish it would fit the bigger rolls of bags though. I haven't had this more than a month and already changed out the bags and my replacement rolls are too big. The color is pretty but even my boys like to use it all the time now to take her out.
customer_reviews.author: Kera Darr

customer_reviews.title: Huge, not for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this a 5 star review because it is good quality and would be great for someone with a large dog. Unfortunately it is HUGE and is way too big for the 8 pound Pomeranian/Chihuahua it was purchased for. Will not be able to use. Wish they had one for small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few different leashes similar to this with very unsatissfactory results. This one seems to be holding out pretty good so far. Easy to operate and I really like the fact that if my dog takes off suddenly and push the button to stop him you don't get a sudden pull on the leash feeling like your shoulder and arm is getting ripped out of its socket. The leash will go a little bit more after pressing the button so there's not such a shock. Seems to be solid and good quality so far. It's on the heavier side but worth it for its quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay but oversized
customer_reviews.text: Just rescued my first doggy and got this little number as an added leash for longer walks. My dog is about 27lbs (Jack Russell mix). The housing portion of the device is pretty big so can be awkward to hold for extended periods. I also notice I have to try to push and hold the lock button initially to ensure it stays locked as it doesn’t stay in place easily.
customer_reviews.author: KYMcManus

customer_reviews.title: Great Product / top notch customer service
customer_reviews.text: I would like to start by saying I do not normally write reviews. But... Great product. Works as advertised. Now, customer service... there was another Emily who wrote a poor review on here because she must have had a bad experience. The company confused myself with her and sent a new leash with a nice note and have had a follow up call to check on me Once again, the product has worked great for me. But, had I been the Emily that had the issue. My hat is off to the customer service for making it right.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your time
customer_reviews.text: This leash worked for about a week. Now it jams almost every time I try to unlock it, and the clip that attaches to the harness is even worse. I actually have to wear gloves to get it to hook on because the piece is so crappy it hurts to try and move it. For $20, I would have expected better as I have paid less for better leashes. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Allows my dog some freedom
customer_reviews.text: My dog is just over 50 lbs and very much loves to run, problem was that we live in the city and the dog parks were closed. She isn't fully trusted off leash so I tried this out and it's been great. We go up to the park each night and she takes off and runs with me or does big circles around me if I'm more still. The locking mechanism is very easy to use and is solid. The reflective leash (pictured) really shows up too. Had this for over six months now and it's never tangled or showed any signs of breaking, so I can't really say anything bad about it.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Much more durable than any other retractable leash I’ve had. I’m pretty sure it’s made for a big dog and my dog is only 15 pounds, but I prefer the durability over the smaller leashes. Hopefully this lasts a long time. Just wish it had the built in light and poop bag holder, but all of those that I’ve had suck.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren and Aaron Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 5 uses.  Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved the feel and ease of use of this leash while running our 45 pound goldendoodle. Unfortunately, the ribbon on it is thin and broke after 5 uses. We now have it knotted up at the end and are still trying to use it until we can find a better leash. Update: 2 star changed to 4 star after writing the review and then having them refund our money, without being prompted, which I thought was classy and professional!
customer_reviews.author: M. Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Recoil A Bit On The Slow Side in Cold Weather
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the product works as described and expected. We have been using it for a couple of weeks now and the only issue thus far is that during below freezing weather, the recoil mechanism (spring) is somewhat slow. As such, if our 45 pound dog is at the full extension and runs toward us, the leash tether hits the ground which is snow covered, wet, or muddy at this time of year in Colorado, so a bit of a problem to clean, etc..
customer_reviews.author: GRS

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this!
customer_reviews.text: This leash is amazing!!!! The only reason why I didn’t give it 5 starts is because it’s quite heavy... Other than that, I LOVED IT! Everything is so well made and so cute! The idea of having the plastic bags and cup of water with it was so cool. I liked it so much that I bought for one of my dogs because her leash broke, and as soon as it arrived I went ahead and ordered another one for my other dog! I really loved it! Very well packed as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Leash!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set to replace the retractable leash that we already had. What a difference! The movement from this one is so much smoother and it retracts easily. We love it. Our puppy really likes this one too. The only thing that is a little awkward is the locking mechanism. Overall, we would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: 1 BZ Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Retractable Leash!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves the extra leash when smelling for treasure, and its easier for me to not go running after her whenever she catches a sniff of something. I've used it a couple times now and it seems to be doing its work just fine. My only concern is that the leash is too week for my 65 lb puppy but its holding for now. It was also nice to receive an extra leash just in case it doesn't hold. Lets just hope she doesn't rip this one.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Best one so far - effortless and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Took a couple of attempts to fully figure out the locking system but once you get it, it’s intuitive. Outstanding, durable and dependable. Not flimsy. A bit heavier compared to some brands, but that’s a good thing - helps with balancing and provides stability. Retracts back flawlessly every single time. Couldn’t have been happier. However it’s not for kids to use - can require an amount of force beyond little kids. But teenagers and adults can happily navigate it.
customer_reviews.author: Saswat Pattanayak

product_meta.title: Ruff 'n Ruffus Retractable Dog Leash with Free Waste Bag Dispenser and Bags + Bonus Bowl | Heavy-Duty 16ft Retracting Pet Leash | 1-Button Control |
feature_bullets: 🐾 DESIGNED FOR DURABILITY 🐾 While other retractable dog leashes easily snap, quickly fray, and can be easily chewed through, our retracting dog walking leash is made using an extra-tough nylon ribbon with a chrome-plated snap hook reinforced at the joint. This means toughness to control dogs up to 110 pounds and durability to withstand daily use.

🐾 GET IN CONTROL 🐾 Our retractable dog leash comes with a unique ‘brake n lock’ system to give your pup room to wander while you’re still in control. With just one button, you can engage free mode to let your pooch explore, lock the leash in place, or smoothly reel it back in.

🐾 THOUGHTFULNESS IN DESIGN 🐾 You’ll love the anti-slip handle that treats you to enhanced comfort, the premium retracting spring that’s tough enough to work even in freezing temperatures, and the 16ft cord that allows your canine pal to explore but still remain within safe distance.

🐾 GET YOUR FREEBIES 🐾 We’ve included a FREE bone-shaped dog waste bag dispenser and 1 roll of plastic waste bags with every heavy duty retractable leash. The waste bag dispenser conveniently clips onto the handle of the retractable pet leash to free up your hands and let you really enjoy that walk.

🐾 BUY RISK FREE 🐾 We’ve got your back with a 100% satisfaction guarantee. Not happy with this retractable dog walker leash? Just reach out to us and we’ll do all we can to make it right. Click ‘Add to Cart’ now and experience the difference that real quality makes!

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
